Explanation: The bug in the buggy code is that it increments the index 'i' whenever it finds two adjacent elements to be the same. This causes it to skip the next element and hence, it fails to count clumps of size greater than 2. Generated Test cases 1-10 should pass the buggy code as they contain clumps of size 2 only. Test case 11 should fail the buggy code as it contains a clump of size greater than 2.
